part.narration: The first day of work is going pretty well. Thud.This interrupts the last few seconds of the work day.
part.line: What was that?
Whatever it is, they had the courtesy of dumping it in our front yard.
part.narration: Yuki looks out the window. She gasps. The team runs out front. Yuki comes to and follows behind.dolly out camera from Yuki's position. When Yuki is done gaping, stop camera. Keep the camera here as Yuki and the team run out (automatically). After everyone gets downstairs and out the front door, move it downward and zoom in on Yuki.

A lighted logo burns. The logo of the Parisian-Nagoyan Network. Two Demonstration Men yell to the outside pedestrians through megaphones. One Demoman speaks in Japanese, one in French. At the same time, they speak the same word.
part.line: Ladies and gentlemen, behold:
The Group's First Demonstration to Japan's Last Video Game Company!
part.narration: The Demomen take sledgehammers to the sign. They blow its bulbs. They blaze its letters. They kick its edges. They leave it there and continue.
part.line: The Parisian-Nagoyan Network is no more!
Sega, accept this destroyed sign as a reminder of your mortality,
And an attack on the thought that possessed so many French to think
that they could simply escape the law of their land
and then take our jobs—
part.narration: The Japanese-speak Demoman slaps the back of his head.
part.line: That wasn't part of the script!
Moving on.
part.narration: The Demoman points his megaphone's speech-end to Nozomi.
part.line: Your response, Vice President?
I have none, I am not she.
part.narration: Nozomi points to Yuki. The men run to her.
part.line: Your response, Vice President?
part.narration: A silence. All eyes on Yuki.
part.line: Application for the New Parisian-Nagoyan Network begins June 30, 2011!
New?
Brand New!
You can't just make a New PNN—
Already did!
Land of same and different alike, catch my tongue:
It matters not if you are French.
It matters not if you are Japanese.
The Artist's only matter is of his soul!
part.narration: All who long to touch code dare applaud. Yuki dances.
part.line: If you have no soul, you can follow these clowns all the way back to the Jagds.
See you all in a few weeks, darlings!
